name: catachresis
text: Go on, make up a tune and sing Ray's lyrics to it. It is OK, everyone wants to do it. It is natural.

name: juancarlos
text: A comment left by juancarlos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, StoatLad, Thorfinn, sean1058, NeoNaoNeo, dizneedave, Ariamaki, GeyserShitdick, lamelliform, TheLoneliestMonkey, farqussus, IrishGuy, fattypneumonia, luckypyjamas, shinsengumi14, brotherbrian, alejandroadam, eRiUukFJk, cuneocapo, alchemicnirvana, Milo, projectiles)

name: atom
text: Uh dude that's the Chevy logo

name: juancarlos
text: A comment left by juancarlos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by lumley, wallabeechamp, aperson)

name: chaesar
text: He's a gear-head, through and through. Remember when he built Phillipe's car, said "feels good to be wrenching again." I have personally known three out-of-work mechanic/alcoholics.

name: luckyg
text: Did they all shave their chest hair into the shape of their car manufacturer of choice's logo?

name: kledermans
text: It's probably actually shaved out of his fur, since a tattoo wouldn't show there for that reason.

name: nixnada
text: See, that's why you should never go dual-class.  Do you put your XP into mechanical skill or alcoholism?

name: gamemeister27
text: One of my uncles. Well he has a job NOW, but he didn't. Still alcoholic though...

name: excusemesenator
text: How can you not know this?

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by zcross00, snowman, NeoNaoNeo, Ariamaki, tellumo)

name: scraggg
text: I can't speak for him, but I was able to accomplish it by not giving a shit about cars.

name: heccibiggs
text: Holla.

name: atticusonline
text:
I have a mini cooper logo tatooed on my chest

...fear me


FEAR ME

name: carlyle
text: Was it for the money?

name: cracklewater
text:
Hella apt. I came here to check the comments for mention of Lyle's 'Ford' tattoo.

I was raised in a country where the kids of the Holden families fought the kids of the Ford families (while the Valiant families were a little bit weird and spooky), and I still didn't recognise it as Chevy.

I give *just* enough of a shit to know it was a car logo, but that was probably partly due to what we've been shown about Lyle's character.

name: panopticism
text: mad props for your icon

name: kledermans
text: He'd rather push a Chevy than drive a Ford.

name: aelindil
text: Pat has a Ford.  That is enough to make it a natural non-choice.

name: atmus
text: Roast Beef has a Ford also.  His Galaxie is enough to counterbalance Pat's Mustang 2.

name: mangtastic
text:
Shit. My name is actually Pat, and I actually drive a Ford.

Things are not looking good.

name: mangtastic
text:
Also in the past year I have become vegetarian.

Oh no oh no oh noooo-

name: fuzzyshoo
text: And you're slated to turn 26 in a couple of years.

name: pogo
text: And it is a stylized bowtie logo, so it is in the appropriate position on Lyle's chest.

name: stagnantdisplay
text: Lyle! You got the Chevy logo tattooed on your chest! How come?

name: invidious
text: 'cause guys with Peugot logo-tattoos always end up getting their asses kicked.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
I hear "Moon River."

And is it me, or has Lyle aged really poorly since the beginning of the strip?

name: rolotonybrowntown
text: right there ray is skating the dream of Susie from Albany. He dream is that she and her dad no longer have diabeties or poverty.

name: rolotonybrowntown
text: HER

name: jocelynthepink
text: No, she was right.

name: setzkin
text: Believe he meant word twelve.

name: salo
text: Yes, jocelynthepink, BELIEVE!

name: spinynorman
text: Ray has skated the fuck out of the painting in my mind.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: God as my witness, I'll one day have a restaurant where salads can come "new girlfriend style".

name: kestral
text: So this was 2 years ago, how's the restaurant plans coming along?

name: geysershitdick
text: The greatest example of dialogue in the history of western literature? MAYBE

name: whuppins
text:
5'd for panels 2 through 5 alone.

Hell, just panel 5, even.

name: slanger
text: I( tried to say the last line to some guy who was into rap, and he was all ???

name: centipede_damascus
text: Ray Smuckles has icky moves!

name: foolio
text:
Is the skate move in Panel 5 even possible? I'm having trouble imagining how one could skate with feet crossed, but both pointing outwards.

Five stars.

name: bovine
text: that is such as a basic Cross Over why only the front foot is even really touching the ground

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Man, I love this one. I love Ray's meta-commenting.."Classic Lyle"

name: gmm
text: That line made the strip for me. So good.

name: scraggg
text: Transmogrified Calvin = chubby.

name: epicurus
text: I need to remember that last panel. Dudes find it hilarious but girlfriend endure it at best.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Ray, Ray, Ray. Tennis is too 80's, and you then pick rollerskating?

name: bixschmix
text: At least he's not wearing the stirrup pants from the Christmas catalog while he skates...

name: hypoluxa
text:
#1 - Panel three just might be the best panel ever.

#2 - I must immediately enter any house I visit with "DAAAAAAMN, PEOPLE. OH HELL YES."

name: jasperjones
text: The only reason I gave this a five instead of a four is that when I got to the last panel, I hit a section in Gang Starr's "The Militia" which matched up perfectly with Ray.  Classico.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Crazy-ass Raccoons!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: crazy ass-raccoons!

name: awko
text: Man, I hate it when I get ass-raccoons.

name: rowboat
text: Totally low-class, you know.

name: rabbidpanda
text: The carpet's luxurious pile is perfect for tracing patterns with roller skates.

name: alzuna
text:
I was just wondering where Lyle & Ray's pictures on their blogs come from...

AND NOW I KNOW.

name: mattylite
text: Oh nice spot, nice, I knew there was something familiar

name: landstander88
text: The presence of Lyle completely explains the smell of simmered-up pinto beans.

name: mangtastic
text: I love your icon so much.

name: ryaldin
text: I'm always reticent about the appearance of rollerskates.

name: lurker-bot
text: You sittin' in the sink!  Why come?

name: daaaaang
text: No Ray don't wear those rollerskates don't you know that they guarantee that you will die of diabetes

name: dondoran
text: Not just whiskey. Of course you need whiskey to bathe, but it is excellent to have soap also.

name: dusty
text: Why did the strip end here when Lyle most assuredly chugged the last of that bottled and then smashed it on Rays head for making him listen to this little rhyme?

name: duperando
text: This proves that I am indeed a nerd, and it's most likely already been said, but DUDE: ROLLERSKATES. that's an omen... right? wow. This may be the first strip I've seen where rollerskates don't pose a threat to the achewood universe.
